snippet: Former Gov. George Ryan’s ending more than five and a half years in federal custody for corruption offenses.
abstract: Former Illinois Gov George Ryan is released from home confinement, ending more than five and a half years in federal custody for corruption offenses.
lead_paragraph: Former Gov. George Ryan’s ending more than five and a half years in federal custody for corruption offenses.

headline.main: Illinois: Former Governor Ryan Freed From Custody
headline.print_headline: Illinois: Former Governor Freed From Custody
